attributes.action:
Add
"VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE"
        to all ballot papers !
attributes.background:
Factors for action:
If higher than 25% of total vote
If it carries the majority vote

What we want:
We demand the line "VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE" be added to all ballot papers !

Why we want it:
Westminster MP's are not performing to the will of the people...

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
